fi.explorator

Class PathFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.explorator.PathFinder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AStar, Dijkstra

    public abstract class PathFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract base class which all path finding algorithms will be extending from. This base class also works as Factory class for PathFinder type of classes. This holds the Grid object as well as start and goal Cell objects.

    • Method Detail

      • createPathFinder

        public static PathFinder createPathFinder(PathFinderType type,
                          Grid grid,
                          Cell start,
                          Cell goal)
        Factory method which is used to instantiate different kinds of PathFinder type classes.
        Parameters:
        type - Enumeration of the algorithm types.
        grid - 2D grid.
        start - Starting cell for path.
        goal - Goal cell for path.
        Returns:
        PathFinder type class.

      • findPathStep

        public abstract void findPathStep()
        Runs algorithm one step at a time. Some algorithms might run continuosly in this method depending on the algorithm implementation.

      • getAdjacentCells

        protected java.util.List<Cell> getAdjacentCells(Cell c)
        Get adjacent cells of the given cell parameter. Cells with value of blockedWeight will be not traversed.
        Parameters:
        c - Cell object which adjacent cells we want to be returned
        Returns:
        ArrayList of adjacent cells

      • getPath

        public abstract Path getPath()
        Get result path from PathFinder
        Returns:
        Path object which represents found path from start cell to goal cell.

        public Cell getStart()
        Get starting cell.
        Returns:

      • pathFound

        public boolean pathFound()
        This should be called in loop to determine when the path is found.
        Returns:
        true/false depending if the path is found between start and goal cells.

        public void setPassableWeight(int passableWeight)
